spell_list.description: When the berserker drops below 75%, 50% and 25% health thresholds, they get damage reduction for a short duration. This increments up to 3 times and each threshold can only trigger once every 15 seconds. Additional increments increase the amount of damage reduced and do not refresh the duration.
spell_list.description_pvp: When the berserker drops below 75%, 50% and 25% health thresholds, they get damage reduction for a short duration. This increments up to 3 times and each threshold can only trigger once every 15 seconds. Additional increments increase the amount of damage reduced and do not refresh the duration.

effect_list.description: When the berserker falls below 75%, 50% and 25% they gain 5% Damage Reduction per increment. Each threshold can only trigger once every 15 seconds.
Cannot be modified except by direct means

spell_list.name: Rampager's Grit
